item.title: Nicole add a quote by Veronica Roth
item.description: "Becoming fearless isn't the point. That's impossible. It's learning how to control your fear, and how to be free from it." -- Veronica Roth

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "Are you, are you coming to the tree? Wear a necklace of rope, side by side with me. Strange things did happen here. No stranger would let it be if we met up At midnight in the hanging tree." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Sam Harris
item.description: "The president of the United States has claimed, on more than one occasion, to be in dialogue with God. If he said that he was talking to God through his hairdryer, this would precipitate a national emergency. I fail to see how the addition of a hairdryer makes the claim more ridiculous or offensive." -- Sam Harris

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Michael Ian Black
item.description: "Marriage felt like a fading American institution, as relevant to me as the Elks Club. Plus, I considered myself punk rock, and punk rockers don't believe in boring societal conventions like marriage. We prefer boring societal conventions like punk rock." -- Michael Ian Black

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Greta Christina
item.description: "Atheists’ anger doesn’t prove that we’re selfish, or joyless, or miserable. It shows that we have compassion, and a sense of justice. We’re angry because we see terrible harm all around us, and we feel desperately motivated to stop it." -- Greta Christina

item.title: Nicole add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "When shit brings you down, just say 'fuck it', and eat yourself some motherfucking candy." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Mindy Kaling
item.description: "One friend with whom you have a lot in common is better than three with whom you struggle to find things to talk about." -- Mindy Kaling

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "Things change. And friends leave. Life doesn't stop for anybody." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: Nicole add a quote by J.D. Salinger
item.description: "I am always saying "Glad to've met you" to somebody I'm not at all glad I met. If you want to stay alive, you have to say that stuff, though." -- J.D. Salinger

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Veronica Roth
item.description: "We believe in ordinary acts of bravery, in the courage that drives one person to stand up for another." -- Veronica Roth

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Veronica Roth
item.description: "The truth has a way of changing people's plans." -- Veronica Roth

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Richard P. Feynman
item.description: "The first principle is that you must not fool yourself and you are the easiest person to fool." -- Richard P. Feynman

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Jon Ronson
item.description: "I suspect it was probably unusual to suffer from both Generalized Anxiety Disorder and Malingering, unproductiveness tending to make me feel anxious, but there it was. I had both." -- Jon Ronson

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Jon Ronson
item.description: "A strange thing happens when you interview a robot. You feel an urge to be profound: to ask profound questions. I suppose it’s an inter-species thing. Although if it is I wonder why I never try and be profound around my dog. ‘What does electricity taste like?’ I ask. ‘Like a planet around a star,’ Bina48 replies. Which is either extraordinary or meaningless - I’m not sure which" -- Jon Ronson

item.title: Nicole add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "Never forget what you are, for surely the world will not. Make it your strength. Then it can never be your weakness. Armour yourself in it, and it will never be used to hurt you." -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Nicole add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "A mind needs books as a sword needs a whetstone, if it is to keep its edge." -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Nicole add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "A bruise is a lesson... and each lesson makes us better." -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Nicole add a quote by John Green
item.description: "My thoughts are stars I cannot fathom into constellations." -- John Green

item.title: Nicole add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Imagining the future is a kind of nostalgia." -- John Green

item.title: Nicole add a quote by John Green
item.description: "How do you just stop being terrified of getting left behind and ending up by yourself forever and not meaning anything to the world?" -- John Green

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Ned Vizzini
item.description: "I don't know how I can be so ambitious and so lazy at the same time." -- Ned Vizzini

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Matthew Quick
item.description: "Life is not a PG feel-good movie. Real life often ends badly. Literature tries to document this reality, while showing us it is still possible for us to endure nobly." -- Matthew Quick

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Anthony Breznican
item.description: "The things we surrender to when we're young, we keep surrendering to the rest of our lives." -- Anthony Breznican

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Anthony Breznican
item.description: "So now she was trying her best to make conversation, but a parent can't leave a child alone for so long and expect the occasional nicety to count for much. Those bonds break away much more quickly and permanently than most people would like to believe." -- Anthony Breznican
